resources.string: We are going to guide you on how to control a simple LED light connected to your Arduino
Turning ON an LED on your Arduino
First of all, upload our code to your Arduino, available here
Now connect an LED to your Arduino following the schematics below
Connect your Arduino to your phone via USB, and click the + button on the main activity
Enter a name for the panel
Done! Now click on the new item created
Inside a panel, click the + button on the bottom right
Now just toggle on and off the newly created switch to light the LED
